sentences.en: ...the ideal of equality and the appreciation of liberty.
sentences.cn: …对平等的向往及对自由的欣赏。

sentences.en: a political system based on the notions of equality and liberty
sentences.cn: 建立在自由平等观念基础上的政治体系

sentences.en: Employees have liberty to use all the museum facilities.
sentences.cn: 雇员获准使用所有博物馆的设备.

sentences.en: He granted the boy liberty to go out.
sentences.cn: 他允许那男孩出去.

sentences.en: He stood for the cause of liberty and justice.
sentences.cn: 他为自由和正义的事业而奋斗.

sentences.en: He took the liberty of using my refrigerator while I was away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候他擅自使用了我的冰箱.

sentences.en: I am afraid we are not at liberty to disclose that information.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我们无权透露这一信息。

sentences.en: I am not at liberty to discuss these matters.
sentences.cn: 我无权讨论这些问题。

sentences.en: I have taken the liberty of submitting an idea to several of their research departments.
sentences.cn: 我已自作主张地向他们的几个研究部门提出了一个想法。

sentences.en: I'm in favour of liberty, of course — but against licence.
sentences.cn: 我当然赞成自由, 不过我反对放纵.

sentences.en: She took the liberty of using your typewriter while you were away.
sentences.cn: 你不在时,她擅自用你的打字机.

sentences.en: the fight for justice and liberty
sentences.cn: 争取正义和自由的斗争

sentences.en: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.cn: 争取自由和平等的斗争

sentences.en: The majority of the people in the world have regained their liberty.
sentences.cn: 世界上大多数人已重获自由.

sentences.en: The Puritans became fugitives in quest of liberty.
sentences.cn: 清教徒变成了追求自由的逃亡者。

sentences.en: the scriptwriter has taken few liberties with the original narrative.
sentences.cn: 剧本作者对原作故事仅作了个别的自由处理。

sentences.en: Two of the escaped prisoners are still at liberty.
sentences.cn: 两名逃犯仍然逍遙法外.

sentences.en: We are resolved to fight to the end: liberty or death.
sentences.cn: 我们决心战斗到底,要么获得自由,要么在战斗中死去.

sentences.en: Without the instrumentality of a free press liberty could not be preserved.
sentences.cn: 如果不能有效地利用新闻自由,就无法维护自由.

sentences.en: You are at liberty to do as you please.
sentences.cn: 你可以随意行事.

sentences.en: you've taken too many liberties with me.
sentences.cn: 你对我太随便了。
